root.name: Déjà Vu II: Lost in Las Vegas
root.description: Kidnapped by two thugs in Chicago you are taken to Las Vegas to see the mobster Tony Malone. During the the meeting you have been tasked with finding the money of the now dead Chicago racketeer Joey Siegel.

similar_games.game: Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom
BS Tantei Club: Yuki ni Kieta Kako
